name: The Way Back (Camilo Quintero)
description:
A scientist builds a time-travelling portal, but its testing goes wrong and his assistant ends up in a distopian future with different time laws, but still in the laboratory. The scientist has managed to create portals in this dimension to help his assistant, but only one of them is the way back home, the rest just lead back to where he appeared. Now he must search and use the scientist's gadgets to find the way to return home.

This game was made in 48h for Ludum Dare 47 Compo.
